paragraphs.text: The reader will do well to turn back to my Introductory Notice to the Epistle of Hermas,[fn-44-P4463_1726096:33-nf] and also to the elucidations[fn-44-P4464_1726158:34-nf] which are appended to that Epistle. If any value attaches to this fragment, it must be found in its illustrations of Hermas and Tertullian. These, in turn, shed light on it.
